languages.text: "Хищник бродит среди твоих людей? Что же, поохотимся на него! Твои слуги не могут его узреть и не знают, где его логово, но я подскажу, как его отыскать. Разожги любопытство зверя — оставь на виду то, что он захочет утащить. И пометь это так, чтобы можно было отследить хищника, несущего в зубах добычу. Так мы охотимся на Фенрисе на хитрую дичь".

"A predator walks among your people? Well, then it's time we became predators ourselves! Your servants can't see it and don't know where its lair lies, but I will tell you how to find it: you need to spark the beast's curiosity. Leave something it craves out in the open and mark it so that you can track the beast as it's carrying the bait away in its jaws. That is how we hunt cunning prey on Fenris."
languages.original_text: "Хищник бродит среди твоих людей? Что же, поохотимся на него! Твои слуги не могут его узреть и не знают, где его логово, но я подскажу, как его отыскать. Разожги любопытство зверя — оставь на виду то, что он захочет утащить. И пометь это так, чтобы можно было отследить хищника, несущего в зубах добычу. Так мы охотимся на Фенрисе на хитрую дичь".

traits.locale_text: "What is there to think about, Aett-Vater? Whatever the price for your world is, this monster, the abhuman that is both dead or alive, must be hunted down and exterminated! It can kill ten thousand warriors at once? So pit a hundred of them, and destroy the vile abomination!"

"What is there to think about, Aett-Vater? Whatever the price for your world is, this monster, the abhuman that is both dead or alive, must be hunted down and exterminated! It can kill ten thousand warriors at once? So pit a hundred of them, and destroy the vile abomination!"

"A predator walks among your people? Well, then it's time we became predators ourselves! Your servants can't see it and don't know where its lair lies, but I will tell you how to find it: you need to spark the beast's curiosity. Leave something it craves out in the open and mark it so that you can track the beast as it's carrying the bait away in its jaws. That is how we hunt cunning prey on Fenris."

Leave something it craves out in the open and mark it so that you can track the beast as it's carrying the bait away in its jaws. That is how we hunt cunning prey on Fenris."

Leave something it craves out in the open and mark it so that you can track the beast as it's carrying the bait away in its jaws. That is how we hunt cunning prey on Fenris."

Leave something it craves out in the open and mark it so that you can track the beast as it's carrying the bait away in its jaws. That is how we hunt cunning prey on Fenris."

languages.text: “掠食者潜伏在人群之中？既然如此，我们自己也该变成掠食者！你的仆人看不到它，也不知道它的巢穴在什么地方，但我可以告诉你该如何找到它。你只需要激发它的好奇心就好。把它想吃的东西放在外面，做个记号，这样当它叼着鱼饵离开的时候，就能追踪到它。在我们芬里斯，我们就是这么对付狡猾的猎物的。”
languages.original_text: "A predator walks among your people? Well, then it's time we became predators ourselves! Your servants can't see it and don't know where its lair lies, but I will tell you how to find it: you need to spark the beast's curiosity. Leave something it craves out in the open and mark it so that you can track the beast as it's carrying the bait away in its jaws. That is how we hunt cunning prey on Fenris."

traits.locale_text: “掠食者潜伏在人群之中？既然如此，我们自己也该变成掠食者！你的仆人看不到它，也不知道它的巢穴在什么地方，但我可以告诉你该如何找到它。你只需要激发它的好奇心就好。把它想吃的东西放在外面，做个记号，这样当它叼着鱼饵离开的时候，就能追踪到它。在我们芬里斯，我们就是这么对付狡猾的猎物的。”

languages.text: «¿Un depredador camina entre vosotros? Bueno, ¡entonces es hora de que nosotros mismos nos convirtamos en depredadores! Sus siervos no pueden verlo y no saben dónde está su guarida, pero yo le diré cómo encontrarlo: tiene que despertar la curiosidad de la bestia. Deje algo que la atraiga al aire libre y márquelo para poder seguir a la bestia mientras se lleva el cebo en sus fauces. Así es como cazamos presas astutas en Fenris».
languages.original_text: "A predator walks among your people? Well, then it's time we became predators ourselves! Your servants can't see it and don't know where its lair lies, but I will tell you how to find it: you need to spark the beast's curiosity. Leave something it craves out in the open and mark it so that you can track the beast as it's carrying the bait away in its jaws. That is how we hunt cunning prey on Fenris."

traits.locale_text: «¿Un depredador camina entre vosotros? Bueno, ¡entonces es hora de que nosotros mismos nos convirtamos en depredadores! Sus siervos no pueden verlo y no saben dónde está su guarida, pero yo le diré cómo encontrarlo: tiene que despertar la curiosidad de la bestia. Deje algo que la atraiga al aire libre y márquelo para poder seguir a la bestia mientras se lleva el cebo en sus fauces. Así es como cazamos presas astutas en Fenris».

languages.text: 「プレデターが民の中を闊歩しているだと？それなら、私たち自身がプレデターになる番だ！あなたの従者らは、やつを見えていないし、その隠れ家がどこにあるかも分かっていない。だが、やつを見つけ出す方法なら、教えてやれるさ。その野獣の好奇心を掻き立てるんだ。やつが欲しがるものを野外に置いておき、顎を使って餌を運び去るのを追跡できるように目印をつけておくのさ。それがフェンリスでの狡猾な獲物の狩り方だ」
languages.original_text: "A predator walks among your people? Well, then it's time we became predators ourselves! Your servants can't see it and don't know where its lair lies, but I will tell you how to find it: you need to spark the beast's curiosity. Leave something it craves out in the open and mark it so that you can track the beast as it's carrying the bait away in its jaws. That is how we hunt cunning prey on Fenris."

traits.locale_text: 「プレデターが民の中を闊歩しているだと？それなら、私たち自身がプレデターになる番だ！あなたの従者らは、やつを見えていないし、その隠れ家がどこにあるかも分かっていない。だが、やつを見つけ出す方法なら、教えてやれるさ。その野獣の好奇心を掻き立てるんだ。やつが欲しがるものを野外に置いておき、顎を使って餌を運び去るのを追跡できるように目印をつけておくのさ。それがフェンリスでの狡猾な獲物の狩り方だ」

languages.text: « Il y a un prédateur parmi les vôtres ? Alors, il est temps de devenir nous-mêmes prédateurs. Certes, vos serviteurs ne peuvent le voir et ignorent où est sa tanière, mais je vais vous dire comment le trouver : il faut titiller sa curiosité. Laissez traîner quelque chose qu'il convoite en marquant l'appât pour pouvoir le traquer une fois qu'il l'aura entre les crocs. C'est comme ça qu'on chasse le gibier un peu trop malin, sur Fenris. »
languages.original_text: "A predator walks among your people? Well, then it's time we became predators ourselves! Your servants can't see it and don't know where its lair lies, but I will tell you how to find it: you need to spark the beast's curiosity. Leave something it craves out in the open and mark it so that you can track the beast as it's carrying the bait away in its jaws. That is how we hunt cunning prey on Fenris."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a un prédateur parmi les vôtres ? Alors, il est temps de devenir nous-mêmes prédateurs. Certes, vos serviteurs ne peuvent le voir et ignorent où est sa tanière, mais je vais vous dire comment le trouver : il faut titiller sa curiosité. Laissez traîner quelque chose qu'il convoite en marquant l'appât pour pouvoir le traquer une fois qu'il l'aura entre les crocs. C'est comme ça qu'on chasse le gibier un peu trop malin, sur Fenris. »

languages.text: "Ein Räuber, der unter Eurem Volk wandelt? Nun, dann wird es Zeit, dass wir selbst Räuber werden! Eure Diener sehen es nicht und wissen nicht, wo sein Versteck liegt, doch ich sage Euch, wie Ihr es findet: Ihr müsst die Neugier des Monsters wecken. Legt einen Köder aus, dem er nicht widerstehen kann, und markiert ihn. Wenn das Monster ihn in seinem Maul davonträgt, könnt Ihr es verfolgen. So jagen wir auf Fenris gerissene Beute."
languages.original_text: "A predator walks among your people? Well, then it's time we became predators ourselves! Your servants can't see it and don't know where its lair lies, but I will tell you how to find it: you need to spark the beast's curiosity. Leave something it craves out in the open and mark it so that you can track the beast as it's carrying the bait away in its jaws. That is how we hunt cunning prey on Fenris."

languages.text: "Halkın arasında bir yırtıcı mı dolanıyormuş? O hâlde bizim de yırtıcı olma vaktimiz gelmiştir! Hizmetkârların gözüne görünmüyor, ininin yeri meçhul olabilir ama bu yaratığı nasıl bulacağını biliyorum. Canavarın merakını çekmek gerek. İlgi duyduğu bir şeyi açıkta bırakıp yemi kaptığında inine kadar takip edeceksin. Fenris'te akıllı avları böyle haklarız."
languages.original_text: "A predator walks among your people? Well, then it's time we became predators ourselves! Your servants can't see it and don't know where its lair lies, but I will tell you how to find it: you need to spark the beast's curiosity. Leave something it craves out in the open and mark it so that you can track the beast as it's carrying the bait away in its jaws. That is how we hunt cunning prey on Fenris."
